JioHotstar is India’s largest premium streaming platform with more than 100,000 hours of drama and movies in 17 languages, and coverage of every major global sporting event.

content_info.title: Cooku with Comali
content_info.description: When cooking chaos meets comic charm! Comalis pair up with stars for a rib-tickling contest, judged by chefs Damu, Koushik Shankar and Madhampatty Rangaraj.

content_info.title: Tourist Family
content_info.description: Seeking refuge in Tamil Nadu, Das and his family face tough trials. However, through acts of kindness, they find the home and hope they never imagined.

content_info.title: Y2K
content_info.description: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Years Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives.

content_info.title: The Holiday Shift
content_info.description: A group of friends who work together at an upscale mall in Love, Ohio learn that love always wins in this romantic and cinematic comedy set during a magical holiday season.

content_info.title: Predator: Killer of Killers
content_info.description: This original animated anthology set in the Predator universe, follows three of the fiercest warriors in human history.

content_info.title: Thendrale Mella Pesu
content_info.description: Brave-hearted Ilamathi is caught between a daring cop and a reckless goon. In this tangled triangle, will her heart survive the storm?

content_info.title: Dashakada Mahotsava
content_info.description: A decade of Colors Kannada calls for a grand celebration! Don’t miss a night of unforgettable performances and a heartfelt tribute to Dr. Shiva Rajkumar.

content_info.title: Criminal Justice: A Family Matter
content_info.description: One murder victim, two prime suspects, and everyone belongs to the same family. It's up to Advocate Madhav Mishra to unravel this 'straightforward' case.

alt.label: Criminal Justice: A Family Matter, Show

content_info.title: Ocean with David Attenborough
content_info.description: The world’s leading natural historian draws on a lifetime of knowledge to reveal how Earth’s vast, interconnected waterways can be restored.

content_info.title: Thendrale Mella Pesu
content_info.description: Brave-hearted Ilamathi is caught between a daring cop and a reckless goon. In this tangled triangle, will her heart survive the storm?

content_info.title: Tu Dhadkan Main Dil
content_info.description: Anupama, the ‘Sarvagunn Sampanna’, is everyone’s favourite! But can she deal with Bachha Party’s burning questions? Find out in this special chat show.

content_info.title: Tourist Family
content_info.description: Seeking refuge in Tamil Nadu, Das and his family face tough trials. However, through acts of kindness, they find the home and hope they never imagined.

content_info.title: Criminal Justice: A Family Matter
content_info.description: One murder victim, two prime suspects, and everyone belongs to the same family. It's up to Advocate Madhav Mishra to unravel this 'straightforward' case.

content_info.title: Cooku with Comali
content_info.description: When cooking chaos meets comic charm! Comalis pair up with stars for a rib-tickling contest, judged by chefs Damu, Koushik Shankar and Madhampatty Rangaraj.

content_info.title: Heart Beat
content_info.description: Reena has become Reena 2.0, Radhi has embraced a new full-time role, and new interns have joined RK Multispeciality to bring fresh rhythm and beats to the hospital.

content_info.title: Noyontara
content_info.description: With a gift of seeing the spirit world, Noyon’s life equals a spooky adventure! When she marries into the Sengupta family, a history of dark secrets unravels.

content_info.title: Hai Junoon! Dream. Dare. Dominate.
content_info.description: When music maestro Gagan backs the Supersonics, underdog Sebi and his dance crew, The Misfits, rise to challenge legacy on the GOATs stage.

content_info.title: Office
content_info.description: Two types of work ethics clash when analogue meets digital in a rural government workplace, propelling the mundane to hilarious.

content_info.title: Spider-Man
content_info.description: Spider-powered Peter Parker becomes a masked hero, facing a vengeful enemy. Can he protect his city?

content_info.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
content_info.description: The quartet assembles again to save their missing friend, daring to navigate through the dangers of Jumanji. How will they survive the perilous adventure?

content_info.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
content_info.description: Balancing school and superhero life, Peter Parker, under Tony Stark's wing, faces a new threat: the Vulture. Can he protect his city?

content_info.title: Venom
content_info.description: Marvel Comics

content_info.title: Game Of Thrones
content_info.description: In the fantasy world of Westeros, the Stark family, Wardens of the North, face a web of intrigue and danger.

content_info.title: Singham Returns
content_info.description: Bad-ass cop Bajirao Singham is back as the DCP of Mumbai. To pave the way for justice, he has to deal with a corrupt politician and an immoral god-man.

content_info.title: Anaconda
content_info.description: Seeking a lost tribe, filmmakers encounter a deceptive guide leading them to a priceless anaconda.

content_info.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
content_info.description: Demon Slayer Hashira training. Prepare for Muzan's attack!

content_info.title: House Of The Dragon
content_info.description: Dragons, power, and the Targaryen dynasty.

content_info.title: The Last Of Us
content_info.description: The story follows Joel, a smuggler hired to escort a teenage girl, Ellie, across a post-apocalyptic United States, where they encounter other survivors and dangerous infected mutants.

content_info.title: Criminal Justice: A Family Matter
content_info.description: One murder victim, two prime suspects, and everyone belongs to the same family. It's up to Advocate Madhav Mishra to unravel this 'straightforward' case.

content_info.title: Thudarum
content_info.description: Taxi driver Benz lives a quiet life with his Ambassador and family. However, his fate shifts and an unexpected twist drags him into a storm he never saw coming.

content_info.title: Singham Returns
content_info.description: Bad-ass cop Bajirao Singham is back as the DCP of Mumbai. To pave the way for justice, he has to deal with a corrupt politician and an immoral god-man.

content_info.title: Criminal Justice: Adhura Sach
content_info.description: When a teenage star's brother becomes the prime suspect in her murder, Madhav Mishra takes the case, only to realise he has to first tackle his client's lies.

content_info.title: Criminal Justice: Behind Closed Doors
content_info.description: Anuradha Chandra stabs her perfect lawyer husband one fateful night and confesses to her crime. However, it is anything but an open-and-shut case.

content_info.title: Raid
content_info.description: Fearless income tax officer Amay Patnaik carries out a risky raid at the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow. Inspired by real-life events.

content_info.title: Special Ops
content_info.description: One is a relentless hero, the other is a terror mastermind. In a race against time, Himmat Singh and his team are on a mission to end a 19-year-long manhunt.

content_info.title: Kannur Squad
content_info.description: In the wake of a scandal, Officer George and his crime squad set out to nab a criminal gang. Will they outsmart the odds and bring justice to the forefront?

content_info.title: Tulsa King
content_info.description: Released from prison, a mobster starts over in Tulsa.

content_info.title: Bloody Daddy
content_info.description: Sumair and Jaggi steal Sikandar's cocaine. Revenge follows: Sikandar kidnaps Sumair's son. But the stolen bag is lost. The stakes rise in Bloody Daddy.

content_info.title: Venom
content_info.description: Marvel Comics

content_info.title: Game Of Thrones
content_info.description: In the fantasy world of Westeros, the Stark family, Wardens of the North, face a web of intrigue and danger.

content_info.title: Captain America: Brave New World
content_info.description: Captain America must unravel a nefarious global plot and stop the Red Hulk.

content_info.title: Atrangi Re
content_info.description: Runaway Rinku gets forcefully married to an already engaged Vishu. The love triangle gets weirder when Rinku's lover Sajjad shows up.

content_info.title: Descendants of the Sun
content_info.description: This drama tells of the love story that develops between a surgeon and a special forces officer.

content_info.title: Aavesham
content_info.description: Three teens befriend eccentric gangster Ranga to get even with their seniors. And then follows booze, parties, and more fights. But everything has a cost!

content_info.title: Rain or Shine
content_info.description: In the rubble of tragedy, Gang-du and Mun-su find common ground of hope.

content_info.title: Arjun Reddy
content_info.description: A short-tempered yet brilliant young medical surgeon immerses himself in drugs and alcohol when his lady-love is forced to marry someone else.

content_info.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
content_info.description: His days as Deadpool behind him, Wade toils away. But a sudden threat has him reluctantly suiting up as he tries to convince Wolverine… oh hell, just watch.

content_info.title: Sita Ramam
content_info.description: On a letter-delivering task, Afreen learns of a 20-year-old romance set amidst a war. Her quest to trace the lovers makes her embrace humanity beyond borders.

content_info.description: Star Vijay Kalakkal Comedy: ROFL Comedy sketches

content_info.description: Star Vijay Fun Games: Hilarious tasks & nail-biting challenges

content_info.title: Star Vijay Classics
